alert.note: Alert for Northeast Johnson County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 15 at 10:09PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...Light Snow and Gusty Winds Starting Wednesday Evening... This is a special weather statement from the National Weather Service Office in Riverton. * WHAT...Light to moderate snow. Accumulations of 1 to 2 inches, with 2 to 4 inches over the northern and southern portions of the Bighorns. North to northwest wind gusting 30 to 45 mph will lead to blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Johnson County and the Bighorn Mountains. * WHEN...6 PM Wednesday to 12 PM Thursday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Travel on roadways will be impacted by winter driving conditions and lowered visibility at times Wednesday night into Thursday morning. Blowing and drifting snow will occur. This includes Interstates 90 and 25.
